description: At 40 shops across the state, residents and tourists flashed their identifications and took part in what supporters hailed as a historic departure from drug laws focused on punishment and prohibition.
title: Colorado Stores Selling Marijuana Open Their Doors
title_page: Colorado Stores Selling Marijuana Open Their Doors - The New York Times
maintext:
Colorado Stores Selling Marijuana Open Their Doors
At 40 shops across the state, residents and tourists flashed their identifications and took part in what supporters hailed as a historic departure from drug laws focused on punishment and prohibition.
